attributes.action: invite Jacqui Janes to join the Government of All the Talents and sack the useless Bob Ainsworth MP
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given Mrs Janes' circumstances (five generations of serving soldiers in her family) she is more suitably qualified than the current incumbent.  More importantly she has the fortitude to stand up to the Prime Minister and argue her case.  If this administration had more members who were honest, trustworthy and showed strength of character then surely it would not be in its current lame duck position.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
